titleStmt.title: A joyful message sent from the Kings Most Excellent Majesty, to Sir John Hotham wherein he declares his last and full resolution concerning the said Sir Iohn, and the town of Hvll : it being comfortable and welcome tydings to all His Majesties loving subjects : together with Sir Iohn Hothams answer thereunto : likewise His Majesties resolution concerning the Earl of Essex, lord generall of the army now setting forth.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
